mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(product_no,mem_id,cart_qty,sub_total) VALUES (#{product_no},#{mem_id},#{cart_qty}, ((SELECT product_price FROM tbl_product WHERE product_no=#{product_no})*#{cart_qty}))
